description: When I'm summoned, draw 1 <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> next round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw 1 Fleeting next round.
flavorText: "It don't make no sense to me. I was knocking 'em in easy, but the last one just... wouldn't go. Not my day, I s'pose..." - Brash Gambler
name: Pool Shark
